stats.title: Your Introductions
stats.subtitle: Every introduction is an opportunity, thoughtfully chosen for you by our dedicated matchmakers.
stats.yourTurnDesc: These introductions are ready for your decision.

main.title: Manage Your Introductions
main.errorLoading: An error occurred while loading your introductions: {error}

dialogs.approveDescription: Expressing interest is an exciting step forward. This lets your matchmaker know you're open to learning more. Are you ready to proceed?
dialogs.declineDescription: Every decision helps us refine your search. Are you sure you'd like to pass on this introduction? Your feedback is a valuable part of the journey.

toasts.errorDescription: Please try refreshing the page or contact support.
toasts.newSuggestionsDescription: Check out the new opportunities waiting for you.
toasts.approvedFirstPartyDesc: Wonderful! We've discreetly shared this suggestion with the other person. Once they approve, we'll guide you both on the next steps.
toasts.approvedSecondPartyDesc: Great news! Now that you've both approved, we will facilitate the exchange of contact details.
toasts.declinedDesc: Thank you for your feedback. This helps us find even better matches for you.
toasts.matchmakerNotified: Your matchmaker has been notified and will guide the process forward.
toasts.refreshSuccessDescription: Your introductions are now up to date.

card.whySpecial: What makes this a special introduction?
card.reasonTeaserDefault: Your matchmaker saw a unique potential worth exploring.
card.clickForDetails: Click for full details and insights

buttons.approveDisabledTooltip: You cannot approve a new introduction while another is in an active process.

header.title: An Introduction, With You in Mind
header.subtitleLine1: When we came across this profile, we immediately thought of you.
header.subtitleLine2: Here‚Äôs why we believe this could be the start of something meaningful.
header.matchStorySubtitle1: We listen to what's important to you, even between the lines.
header.matchStorySubtitle2: Here are some of the connections we identified.
header.whatsNextTitle: What's Next? The Decision is Yours
header.whatsNextSubtitle1: Every decision you make is the right step on your journey.
header.whatsNextSubtitle2: Take your time and choose what feels right to you.

actions.titleExpanded: ‚ú® This is a key moment. What's your decision?
actions.subtitle: Every decision is a new opportunity.
actions.reminder: Remember: Your decision helps us move one step closer to finding your perfect match.

profile.loadingDescription: Just a moment, we're putting everything together for you.
profile.errorDescription: We couldn't load the profile at this time. Please contact your matchmaker for assistance.

aiAnalysisCta.title: üîÆ Ready for a Deeper Look?
aiAnalysisCta.description: Our AI can analyze deep compatibility points to provide you with insights on connection potential, strengths, and even conversation starters.

aiAnalysis.loadingDescription: Our AI is analyzing dozens of data points‚Äîfrom core values to personality traits‚Äîto reveal the deeper potential of this match.
aiAnalysis.errorAlertDescription: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again or contact support.

considerTab.title: Points for Thought and Open Conversation

aiAnalysis.noteText: Remember, this analysis is a powerful tool, but it's meant to guide, not decide. True chemistry and connection are discovered through genuine human interaction.

emptyState.noActiveTitle: Your Next Introduction is on its Way
emptyState.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria to find what you're looking for.
emptyState.noActiveDescription: Our matchmakers are hard at work finding the perfect introductions for you.

ingredients.title: Key Ingredients for a Great Match

aiCta.title: Want a second opinion?
aiCta.description: Get an in-depth AI analysis of connection points, growth potential, and even ideas to start the conversation.

rationale.title: A Special Suggestion For You
rationale.personalNoteTitle: Why I thought this is a great fit for you
rationale.noReasonText: The matchmaker trusts the data to speak for itself.

compatibility.mainSubtitle: An in-depth look at connection points and potential growth areas.
compatibility.errorDescription: One or both profiles are incomplete, so a detailed compatibility analysis cannot be performed.
compatibility.noDataDescription: There isn't enough shared information to perform a detailed compatibility analysis.

reasons.differentOrigin: Diverse backgrounds can enrich a connection

askMatchmaker.title: A Question for {{name}}
askMatchmaker.description: Your matchmaker is here to answer any questions you have about this introduction.
askMatchmaker.errorSubmitting: An error occurred while sending your question. Please try again.

topicSelect.title: What would you like to know more about?
topicSelect.subtitle: Select a category to see some sample questions

input.label: Your Question
input.placeholder: Write your question here... Your matchmaker will be happy to help.
input.info: Your question will be sent directly and privately to your matchmaker.

values.label: Values & Beliefs
values.description: Questions about worldview and core values
questions: Could you tell me more about their general outlook on life?
How central is religious practice in their daily life?
Are there any core values that are particularly important to them?
How do they view the role of tradition in a modern family?

family.label: Family & Background
questions: How would you describe their family dynamic?
What is their relationship with their family like?
What are their thoughts on building a family of their own?
Is there anything notable about their personal background?

career.label: Career & Ambitions
questions: What are their long-term professional aspirations?
How do they view the balance between career and family life?
What are they passionate about in their work or studies?
Are they settled in their career or exploring new paths?

personality.label: Character & Temperament
questions: How would friends describe their personality?
What are some of their strongest character traits?
Are they more introverted or extroverted?
How do they typically handle stress or challenges?

future.label: Future Plans
future.description: Questions about vision and future goals
questions: What are some of their dreams for the future?
Are they planning to stay in their current location long-term?
What is their general vision for their future family life?
How do they envision their life in the next 5-10 years?

other.label: Something Else
questions: I have a specific question about...

inquiryThread.title: Conversation with Your Matchmaker
inquiryThread.subtitle: Ask questions and get professional answers, privately.
inquiryThread.loadingError: An error occurred while loading the conversation.

emptyState.title: Start a Conversation
emptyState.description: Have questions about this introduction? Your matchmaker is here to provide clarity and guidance.

toasts.sendSuccessDescription: Your matchmaker has been notified and will get back to you soon.

timeline.title: Introduction Timeline
timeline.subtitle: Track the progress of this introduction step-by-step.

emptyState.title: No History Yet
emptyState.description: The timeline will update as actions are taken on this introduction.

DRAFT.label: Draft
DRAFT.description: The matchmaker is preparing this introduction.

PENDING_FIRST_PARTY.label: Pending Your Review
PENDING_FIRST_PARTY.description: This introduction is awaiting your review and decision.

FIRST_PARTY_APPROVED.label: You Approved
FIRST_PARTY_APPROVED.description: You approved the introduction. Now awaiting the other party's review.

PENDING_SECOND_PARTY.label: Pending Other Party
PENDING_SECOND_PARTY.description: The introduction is awaiting review from the other party.

SECOND_PARTY_APPROVED.label: They Approved
SECOND_PARTY_APPROVED.description: The other party has approved the introduction. Awaiting the next step.

SECOND_PARTY_DECLINED.label: They Declined
SECOND_PARTY_DECLINED.description: The other party declined this introduction.

AWAITING_MATCHMAKER_APPROVAL.label: Awaiting Matchmaker
AWAITING_MATCHMAKER_APPROVAL.description: Both parties have approved! Awaiting the matchmaker's final confirmation.

CONTACT_DETAILS_SHARED.label: Contact Details Shared
CONTACT_DETAILS_SHARED.description: Contact details have been exchanged. We wish you the best!

AWAITING_FIRST_DATE_FEEDBACK.label: Awaiting Feedback
AWAITING_FIRST_DATE_FEEDBACK.description: The first meeting took place, and we're awaiting feedback.

THINKING_AFTER_DATE.label: Considering
THINKING_AFTER_DATE.description: One or both parties are thinking about the next step.

PROCEEDING_TO_SECOND_DATE.label: Moving to a 2nd Date
PROCEEDING_TO_SECOND_DATE.description: Both parties are interested in a second date.

ENDED_AFTER_FIRST_DATE.label: Ended After 1st Date
ENDED_AFTER_FIRST_DATE.description: The connection will not continue after the first meeting.

MEETING_PENDING.label: Scheduling Meeting
MEETING_PENDING.description: The parties are coordinating a time to meet.

MEETING_SCHEDULED.label: Meeting Scheduled
MEETING_SCHEDULED.description: A first meeting has been scheduled.

MATCH_APPROVED.label: Match Confirmed
MATCH_APPROVED.description: The match was confirmed by the matchmaker. The process is moving forward.

MATCH_DECLINED.label: Match Declined
MATCH_DECLINED.description: The match was declined by the matchmaker.

MARRIED.label: Married
MARRIED.description: Mazel Tov! The couple is married.

EXPIRED.label: Expired
EXPIRED.description: The time to decide on this introduction has passed.

CLOSED.label: Closed
CLOSED.description: The introduction process has been closed.

CANCELLED.label: Cancelled
CANCELLED.description: This introduction was cancelled by the matchmaker.
